text:
During the 
bridging phase, SA is using an ‘interim’ partogram, described in this guideline, that have already incorporated 
most of the newer concepts. 
The National Department of Health will support wide distribution, training in the guidelines and monitor their use. 
In addition, it is imperative that medical and nursing schools in the country use the maternity care guidelines in their 
training programmes. The guidelines contain the basic minimum that needs to be known by all professional
